Setting up the tree

```{r}

library(ape)

#opening tree
phy <- read.tree("Carex_megaphylogeny.dated.out")
phy
length(phy$tip.label)
is.ultrametric(phy)
plot(phy, show.tip.label=F)

#it is not ultrametric, see this post
#http://blog.phytools.org/2016/08/fixing-ultrametric-tree-whose-edges-are.html
library(phytools)
library(phangorn)
## compute the NNLS ultrametric tree
phy<-nnls.tree(cophenetic(phy),phy,rooted=TRUE)
## check
is.ultrametric(phy)

#Now we are making the tree dichotomous
phy <- multi2di(phy)
is.ultrametric(phy)
is.rooted(phy)

#The tree is ready for the analyses!!!!!!

mydata <- read.csv("tiplabels.txt", sep= ";")
mydata

char <- mydata[,3] 
names(char) = mydata[,1]
char

sd <- as.numeric(sdlatitude[-203,1])

names(sd) = pcapruebavignea$x[-203,"NAMES"]


```


This is an old script that we have to update. Once we have uploaded the the phy and the chromosome data, we can use it to model chromosome evolution.

```{r}
library(diversitree)

p <- starting.point.quasse(phy, char)
p

xr <- range(char) + c(-1, 1) * 20 * p["diffusion"]
xr

linear.x <- make.linear.x(xr[1], xr[2])
make <- function(lambda, mu) make.quasse(phy, char, sd, lambda, mu, sampling.f=0.70)
nodrift <- function(f) constrain(f, drift ~ 0)
f.c.c <- make(constant.x, constant.x)
f.l.c <- make(linear.x, constant.x)
f.c.l <- make(constant.x, linear.x)
f.s.c <- make(sigmoid.x, constant.x) 
f.c.s <- make(constant.x, sigmoid.x)
f.h.c <- make(noroptimal.x, constant.x) 
f.c.h <- make(constant.x, noroptimal.x)
 

control <- list(parscale = 0.1, reltol = 0.001)
LATC.mle.c.c <- find.mle(nodrift(f.c.c), p, lower = 0, control = control, verbose = 0)



p.c <- LATC.mle.c.c$par
p.c
p.l.c <- c(p.c[1], l.m = 0, p.c[2:3])
p.l.c
p.c.l <- c(p.c[1:2], m.m = 0, p.c[3]) 
p.c.l
p.s.c <- c(p.c[1], p.c[1], mean(char), 1, p.c[2:3])
p.s.c
p.c.s <- c(p.c[1:2], p.c[2], mean(char), 1, p.c[3])
p.c.s
p.h.c <- c(p.c[1], p.c[1], mean(char), 1, p.c[2:3])
p.h.c
p.c.h <- c(p.c[1:2], p.c[2], mean(char), 1, p.c[3])
p.c.h

LATC.mle.d.c.c <- find.mle(f.c.c, coef(LATC.mle.c.c, TRUE), control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.l.c <- find.mle(nodrift(f.l.c), p.l.c, control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.c.l <- find.mle(nodrift(f.c.l), p.c.l, control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.d.l.c <- find.mle(f.l.c, coef(LATC.mle.l.c, TRUE), control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.d.c.l <- find.mle(f.c.l, coef(LATC.mle.c.l, TRUE), control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.s.c <- find.mle(nodrift(f.s.c), p.s.c, control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.d.s.c <- find.mle(f.s.c, coef(LATC.mle.s.c, TRUE), control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.c.s <- find.mle(nodrift(f.c.s), p.c.s, control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.d.c.s <- find.mle(f.c.s, coef(LATC.mle.c.s, TRUE), control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.h.c <- find.mle(nodrift(f.h.c), p.h.c, control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.d.h.c <- find.mle(f.h.c, coef(LATC.mle.h.c, TRUE), control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.c.h <- find.mle(nodrift(f.c.h), p.c.h, control = control, verbose = 0)
LATC.mle.d.c.h <- find.mle(f.c.h, coef(LATC.mle.c.h, TRUE), control = control, verbose = 0)


LATCVIGNEAanova <- anova(LATC.mle.c.c, OU.constant.constant = LATC.mle.d.c.c, BM.linear.constant = LATC.mle.l.c, BM.constant.linear = LATC.mle.c.l, OU.linear.constant = LATC.mle.d.l.c, OU.constant.linear = LATC.mle.d.c.l, BM.sigmoid.constant = LATC.mle.s.c, OU.sigmoid.constant = LATC.mle.d.s.c, BM.constant.sigmoid = LATC.mle.c.s, OU.constant.sigmoid = LATC.mle.d.c.s, BM.hump.constant = LATC.mle.h.c, OU.hump.constant = LATC.mle.d.h.c, BM.constant.hump = LATC.mle.c.h, OU.constant.hump = LATC.mle.d.c.h)
```
